settingsApiKeyDescription: Used for Firecrawl /scrape. Required for the official endpoint; optional for a custom endpoint.
settingsFirecrawlEndpointDescription: Optional. Base URL only (no need to include /v2/scrape). Leave empty to use the official endpoint; when set, API key becomes optional.
settingsDefaultServiceDescription: Used as the default option in the panel
settingsDefaultNotebookDescription: Used when no notebook is selected in the panel
settingsAutoOpenNoteDescription: Automatically open the newly created note after fetching
errorMissingApiKey: Please set your Firecrawl API key in plugin settings (required for the official endpoint)
